name: TimeMap Template
summary: Learn about .TMVT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Select File → Save As → Save As Template....
Choose the save location, name the file, and verify the "Save as type" drop down menu as TimeMap Visual (*.tmvt), select Save.
A "Template Color Category" dialog box will appear, select the color category you would like to place the template in, and click OK.
NOTE: The TMVT file is similar to the .TMV file.

description: Template created by TimeMap, a timeline graphing application; contains a customized or predefined timeline template; predefined templates include fact flag styles, backgrounds, title styles, and time scale styles.
